title: How to Make a Fiesta Loaf

steps.headline: Mix all of the ingredients together in a large bowl except for the rice and the garnishes.
Shape into a ring on a very lightly greased ring mold.
Remove the ring from the mold and put on the serving plate.
Fill the center with the Confetti Rice.
Add the green pepper and tomato wedges.

text: Mix all of the ingredients together in a large bowl except for the rice and the garnishes.  Shape into a ring on a very lightly greased ring mold.  Bake at 350 °F (177 °C) for 1 hour.  Drain well.  Remove the ring from the mold and put on the serving plate.  Fill the center with the Confetti Rice.  Add the green pepper and tomato wedges.
